title: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park: Webcams
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Webcams              Webcams           Be there without being there through the lens of the Paterson Falls Cam. EarthCam  We hope you can come and visit us in person soon, but until then, experience the sights and sounds of the Paterson Great Falls any time of the day or night by clicking on the "Paterson Falls Cam." Enjoy!
